post_message: A shirtless man got himself into quite a predicament after climbing up a basketball hoop in Seattle and somehow managing to get stuck upside down.   Hanging by a foot, the man flailed and thrashed about while officers tried to figure out how to get him down.    Eventually, a couple of firefighters came in with a ladder, cut the net down and rescued him.   "He may be arrested for property destruction, or at least goal-tending," the Seattle Police Department tweeted on Friday.   Read KTLA's story here: @webpagelink
